sentences.en: Hi, I'm calling about the ad for the one-bedroom apartment.
sentences.cn: 你好，我打电话来询问一居室公寓的广告。

sentences.en: Rents here are very high; a one-bedroom apartment may cost around 1,000 pounds a week.
sentences.cn: 这里的租金非常高；一室一厅的公寓一周大约要花费1000英镑。

sentences.en: Soon the two-bedroom and one-bedroom apartments were sold out.
sentences.cn: 很快两居室和一居室就卖完了。
